card.name: Bruenor Battlehammer
card.text: Each creature you control gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.You may pay {0} rather than pay the equip cost of the first equip ability you activate each turn.

card.name: Drizzt Do'Urden
card.text: Double strikeWhen Drizzt Do'Urden enters the battlefield, create Guenhwyvar, a legendary 4/1 green Cat creature token with trample.Whenever a creature dies, if it had power greater than Drizzt's power, put a number of +1/+1 counters on Drizzt equal to the difference.

card.name: Drizzt Do'Urden
card.text: Double strikeWhen Drizzt Do'Urden enters the battlefield, create Guenhwyvar, a legendary 4/1 green Cat creature token with trample.Whenever a creature dies, if it had power greater than Drizzt's power, put a number of +1/+1 counters on Drizzt equal to the difference.

card.name: Ellywick Tumblestrum
card.text: +1: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)−2: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

card.name: Ellywick Tumblestrum
card.text: +1: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)−2: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Flumph
card.text: Defender, flyingWhenever Flumph is dealt damage, you and target opponent each draw a card.

card.name: Gloom Stalker
card.text: As long as you've completed a dungeon, Gloom Stalker has double strike.

card.name: Lolth, Spider Queen
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a loyalty counter on Lolth, Spider Queen.0: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.−3: Create two 2/1 black Spider creature tokens with menace and reach.−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent is dealt combat damage by one or more creatures you control, if that player lost less than 8 life this turn, they lose life equal to the difference."

card.name: Lolth, Spider Queen
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a loyalty counter on Lolth, Spider Queen.0: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.−3: Create two 2/1 black Spider creature tokens with menace and reach.−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent is dealt combat damage by one or more creatures you control, if that player lost less than 8 life this turn, they lose life equal to the difference."

card.name: Nadaar, Selfless Paladin
card.text: VigilanceWhenever Nadaar, Selfless Paladin enters the battlefield or attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you've completed a dungeon.

card.name: Nadaar, Selfless Paladin
card.text: VigilanceWhenever Nadaar, Selfless Paladin enters the battlefield or attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you've completed a dungeon.

card.name: Portable Hole
card.text: When Portable Hole enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less until Portable Hole leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Power Word Kill
card.text: Destroy target non-Angel, non-Demon, non-Devil, non-Dragon creature.

card.name: Prosperous Innkeeper
card.text: When Prosperous Innkeeper enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Shortcut Seeker
card.text: Whenever Shortcut Seeker deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

card.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
card.text: Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until that player has exiled cards with total mana value 20 or more.

card.name: Tiamat
card.text: FlyingWhen Tiamat enters the battlefield, if you cast it, search your library for up to five Dragon cards not named Tiamat that each have different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Vorpal Sword
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch.{5}{B}{B}{B}: Until end of turn, Vorpal Sword gains "Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."Equip {B}{B}
